Our [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook which will form the final report. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

You can run code here and insert results directly.

```{r}
plot(cars)
```

Add a new chunk by clicking the *Insert Chunk* button on the toolbar or by pressing *Cmd+Option+I*.
